QuestData.Title: The Beasts Within
QuestData.Description: <Bloodslayer T'ara eyes you for a moment.>$B$BAfter de fall of Hakkar, de city of de Gurubashi fell into disrepair, and de jungle claimed most of Zul'Gurub for its own. Some powerful beasts now be livin' in da cracks an' hollows of de ancient city. $B$BWe seen de powers dem Gurubashi priests wield - dey turn de very plantlife against us wit' venomous concoctions. You tink you be strong? Dispose of dese beasts, before dey become mindless agents of Jin'do.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: We can't let the Gurubashi control them!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill the Florawing Hive Queen, Tor-Tun the Slumberer, and a Lost Offspring of Ghaz'Ranka inside of Zul'Gurub on Heroic difficulty.
